snippet: The scientists also recommended that infants as young as 6 months get measles vaccine when the risk of catching it is high.
abstract: World Health Organization scientists recommend that new polio vaccine planned for release in April 2016 be made without strain used to fight type of virus no longer seen, which was causing paralysis.
lead_paragraph: The scientists also recommended that infants as young as 6 months get measles vaccine when the risk of catching it is high.

headline.print_headline: Science and Health; W.H.O. Panel Backs Polio Vaccine With Just 2 Strains
headline.main: W.H.O. Panel Backs Polio Vaccine With Just 2 Strains
